description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts that represent functional involvement of a caregiver or member of a care team with an activity being transmitted (e.g., Case Manager, Evaluator, Transcriber, Nurse Care Practitioner, Midwife, Physician Assistant, etc.). Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the PRT segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0912 (Participation)

copyright.value: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

definition.value: Alert Acknowledging Provider
Person that cosigned the prescription
Admitting Provider

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the PV1 segment, when more information about PV1-17 Admitting doctor is desired.
PV1-17 Admitting doctor

definition.value: The specific Health Professional who has been approved to perform the ordered services for the patient.

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the AUT segment, which represents an authorization or a pre-authorization for a referred procedure or requested service by the payor covering the patient's health care. This code is used when the authorization is for a person.

definition.value: Assistant/Alternate Interpreter
Administering Provider

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the RXA segment, when more information about RXA-10 Administering Provider is desired.
RXA-10 Administering Provider

definition.value: The Provider Organization that has been approved to perform the sanctioned procedures to which the patient was referred to.

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the AUT segment, which represents an authorization or a pre-authorization for a referred procedure or requested service by the payor covering the patient's health care. This code is used when the authorization is for an organization.

definition.value: Assistant Result Interpreter

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the OBR segment, where OBR-33 Assistant Result Interpreter has been marked for backwards compatibility only.

definition.value: Attending Provider

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the PV1 segment, when more information about PV1-7 Attending doctor is desired.
PV1-7 Attending doctor

definition.value: Identifies the entity responsible for initiating the event

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the ORC segment, where ORC-19 Action By has been marked for backwards compatibility only.
Replaces ORC-19 Action By

definition.value: The organization that is responsible for collecting the specimen.

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the OBR segment, where OBR-10 Collector Identifier, when intended to convey the organization information, has been marked for backwards compatibility only.

definition.value: Consulting Provider
Organization, person or device that has the authority to remove a specimen identifier.
Dispensing Provider

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the RXD segment, where RXD-10 Dispensing Provider has been marked for backwards compatibility only.
RXD-10 Dispensing Provider

definition.value: The Assistant Result Interpreter who is expected to interpret the result (in the future).

valueString.value: This will support filtering orders into the correct work queue of the Assistant Result Interpreter.

definition.value: Identifies the device that was used to enter the order into the system.

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the ORC segment, where ORC-18 Entering Device has been marked for backwards compatibility only.

definition.value: Identifies the organization that entered the order into the system.

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the ORC segment, where ORC-17 Entering Organization has been marked for backwards compatibility only.

definition.value: Identifies the person that entered the order into the system

valueString.value: Replaces ORC-10 Entered By
Replaces ORC-10 Entered By

definition.value: The Principal Result Interpreter who is expected to interpret the result (in the future).

valueString.value: This will support filtering orders into the correct work queue of the Principal Result Interpreter.
This role is used in the PRT associated with the OBX segment, where OBX-18 Equipment Instance Identifier has been marked for backwards compatibility only.

definition.value: Family Health Care Professional
Describes the location (coordinates) of the specimen/container in the previous holder / storage equipment before the move or the geographical location from which the specimen/container was moved.
Medical Director

valueString.value: OBX-25 Performing Organization Medical Director

definition.value: The facility from where the order was placed

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the ORC segment, where ORC-21 Ordering Facility Name, ORC-22 Ordering Facility Address and ORC-23 Ordering Facility Phone Number have been marked for backwards compatibility only.

definition.value: Ordering Provider

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with either the ORC segment, where ORC-12 Ordering Provider, OBR-16 Ordering Provider, ORC-24 Ordering Provider Address have been marked for backwards compatibility only, or the OBR segment, where OBR-16 Ordering Provider has been marked for backwards compatibility only; the RXO segment, when more information about RXO-14 Ordering Provider's DEA Number is desired; the RXE segment, where RXE-13 Ordering Provider's DEA Number has been marked for backwards compatibility only.
ORC-12 Ordering Provider, OBR-16 Ordering Provider, RXO-14 Ordering Provider's DEA Number, RXE-13 Ordering Provider's DEA Number, ORC-24 Ordering Provider Address

definition.value: The organization the ordering provider is associated with.

valueString.value: This code is broader than Referring Provider Organization (RPO); it can be used for inter and intra-organizational orders.

display.value: Outside Site(s) Where Observation May Be Performed

definition.value: Outside Site(s) Where Observation May Be Performed

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the OM1 segment, where OM1-27 Outside Site(s) Where Observation May Be Performed has been deprecated.
Replacing OM1-27 Outside Site(s) Where Observation May Be Performed

definition.value: Packed by
Identifies the person taking responsibility for the prescription dispense

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the RXE segment, where RXE-14 Pharmacist/Treatment Supplier's Verifier ID has been marked for backwards compatibility only.
Replaces RXE-14 Pharmacist/Treatment Supplier's Verifier ID

definition.value: Primary Interpreter
Performing Organization
Performing Organization Medical Director

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the OBX segment, where OBX-25 Performing Organization Medical Director has been marked for backwards compatibility only

definition.value: Primary Care Provider
Pharmacy the patient would prefer to use for any future medication orders.

valueString.value: When a patient registers, this allows a system to indicate the default pharmacy to which the provider should send prescribed medication orders.
Most likely to be used in ADT messages for outpatient care.

definition.value: Identifies the person responsible for interpreting the results of the study/test

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the OBR segment, where OBR-32 Principal Result Interpreter has been marked for backwards compatibility only.

definition.value: Results Copies To
The Health Professional who refers the patient.
Organization, person or device that has the authority to assign a specimen identifier.
Responsible Observer

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the OBX segment, where OBX-16 Responsible Observer has been marked for backwards compatibility only
OBX-16 Responsible Observer

definition.value: Referring Provider

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the PV1 segment, when more information about PV1-8 Referring doctor is desired.
PV1-8 Referring doctor

definition.value: The Provider Organization that refers the patient.
Referred to Provider
Send by
The person that collected the specimen.

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the OBR segment, where OBR-10 Collector Identifier, when intended to convey person information, has been marked for backwards compatibility only
OBR-10 Collector Identifier

definition.value: Describes the location (coordinates) of the specimen/container in the previous holder / storage equipment after the move or the geographical location to which the specimen/container was moved.

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the OBR segment, where OBR-34 Technician has been marked for backwards compatibility only
This role is used in the PRT associated with the OBR segment, where OBR-35 Transcriptionist has been marked for backwards compatibility only

definition.value: Identifies the person verifying the dispense / a step in the dispense process / verifying the treatment corresponds to the order

valueString.value: This role is used in the PRT associated with the ORC segment, where Replaces ORC-11 Verified By has been marked for backwards compatibility only
Replaces ORC-11 Verified By

display.value: Verifying Pharmaceutical Supplier (not sure how to dissect Pharmacist/Treatment Supplier's Verifier ID)

definition.value: Verifying Pharmaceutical Supplier (not sure how to dissect Pharmacist/Treatment Supplier's Verifier ID)

valueString.value: RXE-14 Pharmacist/Treatment Supplier's Verifier ID
Use of this code is deprecated; depending on the role of the person use either PH or VP.

display.value: Verifying Treatment Supplier (not sure how to dissect Pharmacist/Treatment Supplier's Verifier ID)

definition.value: Verifying Treatment Supplier (not sure how to dissect Pharmacist/Treatment Supplier's Verifier ID)

valueString.value: RXE-14 Pharmacist/Treatment Supplier's Verifier ID
Use of this code is deprecated; depending on the role of the person use either PH or VP.

definition.value: Waypoint Recipient
